captions.text:
Hut, hut, hut, hut,
hut, hut, hut, hut,

Hut, hut, hut, hut,
hut, hut, hut, hut.

Hut, hut, hut, hut, hut, hut,
hut, hut, hut, hut, hut, hut !

- This is where they pay taxes, right ?
- Right.

This money is for
the year's assessment...

on the St. Helen of the Blessed Shroud
Orphanage in Calumet City, Illinois.

Five thousand bucks.
It's all there, pal.

comments.text:
look luke, it's slapstick comedy which sole purpose is to entertain... 
don't overthink it! Stan Laurel pulls out of his jacket pocket a glass of 
water after a hard days construction work next to an absolutely 
flabbergasted Oliver Hardy! Ace Ventura gets dragged around the fishtank by 
a great white shark and all he has are torn pants! it's comedy, man, and 
let's not forget they were on a mission from God, and maybe the Big Guy 
helped them out a little bit, haha!
